plugin_manifest.name: Group Administrators for Roles
plugin_manifest.author: András Szepesházi - Arck Interactive, LLC
plugin_manifest.blurb: Implements the Group Administrator role via the Roles framework
plugin_manifest.description: Adds more granular access to your site by introducing Group Administrators. When using this plugin, regular members of your site won't be able to create groups. A user has to be a Group Administrator to create a new group.
